name: Baladacam
tag_list: webcams-e-cameras-ao-vivo, baladas, balada, bares, bar, segurana, circuito-interno, monitoramento, restaurantes, streaming, web, cams, video, audio, live-cam, broadcast, ip, axis, cctv, cftv, barcam, free-live-streaming, hosted-webcameras, webcams-hosting
overview:
BaladaCam was created in October of 2006 with the intent to introduce a new and innovative way to advertise bars, clubs, hotels, resorts, cafés and restaurants worldwide. The mission of BaladaCam is to connect establishment owners with their patrons in the most efficient, effective way possible.

We strive to provide our clients with a valuable tool for advertising their business while providing our website visitors with a simple yet effective means of seeking entertainment and fun. BaladaCam provides a unique and interactive way to advertise using the most powerful promotional tool available, the internet.
